scripts.dev:stable: rimraf dev/ && concurrently  -n  extension,background "npm run dev:main"  "npm run dev:background"
scripts.dev:nightly: rimraf dev/ && concurrently   -n  extension,background "npm run dev:main --nightly"  "npm run dev:background --nightly"
scripts.prod:build-mv2: rimraf build/ && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NODE_ENV=production babel-node scripts-mv2/build --type=prod
scripts.prod:build: rimraf build/ && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NODE_ENV=production babel-node scripts/build
scripts.prod:build:light: rimraf build/ && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NODE_ENV=production babel-node scripts/build --dontInjectConnector
scripts.prod:build-win: rimraf build/ && SET NODE_ENV=production && babel-node scripts/build
scripts.prod:unsigned: npm run prod:build -- --env ${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} && npm run prod:compress -- --env ${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} --app-id yoroi-${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} --zip-only --codebase https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet}-extension.crx
scripts.prod:unsigned-mv2: npm run prod:build-mv2 -- --env ${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} && npm run prod:compress -- --env ${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} --app-id yoroi-${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} --zip-only --codebase https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet}-extension.crx
scripts.prod:unsigned:light: npm run prod:build:light -- --env ${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} && npm run prod:compress -- --env ${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} --app-id yoroi-${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet} --zip-only --codebase https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-${CARDANO_NETWORK:-testnet}-extension.crx
scripts.prod:nightly: npm run prod:build -- --env 'mainnet' --nightly && npm run -s prod:compress -- --env 'mainnet' --app-id 'yoroi-nightly' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-nightly-extension.crx' --key "'${YOROI_NIGHTLY_PEM:-./nightly-key.pem}'"
scripts.prod:nightly-mv2: npm run prod:build-mv2 -- --env 'mainnet' --nightly && npm run -s prod:compress -- --env 'mainnet' --app-id 'yoroi-nightly' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-nightly-extension.crx' --key "'${YOROI_NIGHTLY_PEM:-./nightly-key.pem}'"
scripts.prod:nightly:light: npm run prod:build:light -- --env 'mainnet' --nightly && npm run -s prod:compress -- --env 'mainnet' --app-id 'yoroi-nightly' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-nightly-extension.crx' --key "'${YOROI_NIGHTLY_PEM:-./nightly-key.pem}'"
scripts.prod:stable: npm run prod:build -- --env 'mainnet' && npm run prod:compress -- --env 'mainnet' --app-id 'yoroi' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-extension.crx' --key ./production-key.pem
scripts.prod:stable-mv2: npm run prod:build-mv2 -- --env 'mainnet' && npm run prod:compress -- --env 'mainnet' --app-id 'yoroi' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-extension.crx' --key ./production-key.pem
scripts.prod:stable:light: npm run prod:build:light -- --env 'mainnet' && npm run prod:compress -- --env 'mainnet' --app-id 'yoroi' --zip-only --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-extension.crx' --key ./production-key.pem
scripts.prod:nightly-win: npm run prod:build-win -- --env=mainnet --nightly && npm run -s prod:compress -- --env=mainnet --app-id=yoroi-nightly --zip-only --codebase=https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-nightly-extension.crx --key="${YOROI_NIGHTLY_PEM:-./nightly-key.pem}"
scripts.prod:stable-win: npm run prod:build-win -- --env=mainnet && npm run prod:compress -- --env=mainnet --app-id=yoroi --zip-only --codebase=https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-extension.crx --key=./production-key.pem
scripts.eslint-loud: eslint app chrome scripts scripts-mv2 webpack/*.js webpack-mv2/*.js
scripts.test:build: npm run prod:build-mv2 -- --env 'test' && npm run prod:compress -- --env 'test' --app-id 'yoroi' --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-test-extension.crx' --key ./e2etest-key.pem
scripts.test:build:mainnet: npm run prod:build-mv2 -- --env 'mainnet' && npm run prod:compress -- --env 'test' --app-id 'yoroi' --codebase 'https://yoroiwallet.com/dw/yoroi-test-extension.crx' --key ./e2etest-key.pem
